description:
Dodge, wind and jump to link all
pieces of DNA and build the longest
chain ever while fighting off vicious
viruses. Look at your surroundings
and get one off bonuses such as a
vaccine or a micro-world equivalent of
a rocket-launcher! Put your survival
skills to the test in this
reflex-awakening action featuring 2
modes of gameplay!
name:
Escape the Virus:
Swarm Survival
